sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'
import Video from '../../videos/video.mp4'
import { Button } from '../ButtonElements'
import {
  HeroContainer,
  HeroBg,
  VideoBg,
  HeroContent,
  HeroH1,
  HeroP,
  HeroBtnWrapper,
  ArrowForward,
  ArrowRight,
} from './HeroElements'

const HeroSection = () => {
  const [hover, setHover] = useState(false)

  const onHover = () => {
    setHover(!hover)
  }

  return (
    <HeroContainer>
      <HeroBg>
        <VideoBg autoPlay loop muted src={Video} type="video/mp4" />
      </HeroBg>
      <HeroContent>
        <HeroH1>The French Review</HeroH1>
        <HeroP>
          Join my Youtube channel where I talk everything coffee, tech and
          lifestyle!
        </HeroP>
        <HeroBtnWrapper>
          <Button
            href="https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXZEUlSUpG_aM-bcQr1Ej8A"
            aria-label="Youtube">
            target="_blank"
            onMouseEnter={onHover}
            onMouseLeave={onHover}
            primary="true"
            dark="true"
          >
            Visit Channel {hover ? <ArrowForward /> : <ArrowRight />}
          </Button>
        </HeroBtnWrapper>
      </HeroContent>
    </HeroContainer>
  )
}

export default HeroSection
